column2: Choose one, if all are taken take 1d8 damage instead: You become jittery and restless, unable to stay in one spot for long without feeling the compulsion to move;  You speak much faster than you used to causing you to sometimes stumble over your words regradless of the topic;  Your metabolism skyrockets causing you to need to eat and drink much more than you used to;
You lose this spell until the next time you rest for at least 8 hours and gain a Corruption.
One target that you can touch gains an extra action until your next turn.
Up to two targets that you can touch gain an extra action until your next turn.
Up to two targets that you can touch gain 2 extra actions until your next turn.
Up to two targets that you can touch gain 2 extra actions for the next 2 rounds counted from this turn.
Up to four targets that you can touch gain 2 extra actions for the next 4 rounds counted from this turn.
Up to six targets that you can touch gain 2 extra actions for the next minute (10 rounds).
